question_text: Which of the following best describes the ONTâ€™s role in relation to the demarcation point?
answer_options: The ONT sits beyond the demarcation and is customer-owned
The ONT sits before the demarcation and is ISP-managed
The ONT bridges two coaxial cable domains at the demarc
The ONT operates as the router for all devices inside the network
correct_answer: The ONT sits before the demarcation and is ISP-managed
explanation: ONTs are typically installed and managed by the ISP and represent the last piece of equipment before the demarcation point.
